meanings.definition: Not able to be crushed or flattened.
meanings.sent1: The uncrushable toy car remained intact even after being stepped on.
meanings.sent2: The uncrushable foam material provided excellent protection for fragile items.
meanings.sent3: The uncrushable pillow fought back against the weight of the heavy book.
meanings.sent4: Her uncrushable spirit shone brightly even in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The uncrushable diamond sparkled with unmatched brilliance.

meanings.definition: Resistant to being crushed or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: The uncrushable metal door withstood the force of the hurricane.
meanings.sent2: The uncrushable plastic bottle survived being run over by a car.
meanings.sent3: The uncrushable cake managed to stay whole despite the clumsy server's attempts.
meanings.sent4: His uncrushable determination propelled him to overcome all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The uncrushable fortress stood tall against the enemy's siege.
